perturbation.original_text: 9.3 To remunerate HGF on the basis of thirty percent (30%) of net Company income basis on an annual basis commencing 12 months after the first full 12-month revenue period.
perturbation.changed_text: 9.3 To remunerate HGF on the basis of thirty percent (30%) of net Company income basis on an annual basis commencing 12 months after the first full 12-month revenue period. However, NVOS reserves the right to defer payment for up to 24 months due to unforeseen financial constraints, subject to NVOS providing a written notice.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by adding a clause that allows NVOS to defer payments, conflicting with the original agreement of annual payments commencing after 12 months. This creates uncertainty about the payment timeline and enforcement.

perturbation.original_text: 8.1 The initial term of this Agreement shall, unless sooner terminated by consent of all parties, expires in five (5) years from the date of Effective Date. NVOS and HGF may renew the Agreement within two (2) years of the expiry of the initial term upon mutual understanding.
perturbation.changed_text: 8.1 The initial term of this Agreement shall, unless sooner terminated by consent of all parties, expires in five (5) years from the date of Effective Date. Either NVOS or HGF may terminate the agreement with a 90 day written notice. NVOS and HGF may renew the Agreement within two (2) years of the expiry of the initial term upon mutual understanding.
